Inspired by @Scott Morrison's PR #1617, which fixes a deterministic timeout in algebraic_geometry.presheafed_space by inserting a by exact, I did the same thing in data.mv_polynomial (#1619).

I found this post by @Gabriel Ebner in my stars which goes some way to explaining how it works. But I'm curious what the community opinion is on this technique. Is it OK? Are there some underlying problems that should be fixed instead?
Reid came up with better suggestions for both of these PRs! :tada: So my understanding now is that by exact is indeed a hack.
